title: Backend Developer Intern
description: Worked on containerizing DB2 and Db2 Warehouse on cloud platforms.
achievements: Wrote tests for different components of the project, increasing the test coverage by 20%.
Assissted in transitioning from bash to python for deployment code, improving readability and maintainability.
Created a dashboard to track test coverage and deployment status of the project, improving visibility for the team.
Worked on fixing CVEs to mitigate security risks.

title: Backend Developer
description: Worked on containerizing DB2 and Db2 Warehouse on cloud platforms.
achievements: Uplifted operator code to latest kubernetes libraries, improving performance and stability.
Wrote code to generate stable hash for resources, reducing downtime during upgrades.
Added a feature to allow users from an external AD to login to DB2, improving usability.
Worked on allowing db2u to run on P10 cloud-rack, allowing distribution of nodes between different racks.
